rows.label: qst103408_msg0005
rows.name: Do not think that this is the end.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0006
rows.name:
Brionac is not the only group
plotting a rebellion against
the Superbian Empire.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0007
rows.name: That is no longer a viable option.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0008
rows.name: I will soon return to my Core Crystal.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0009
rows.name:
I will forget everything...
The ideals I pursued with him
will become irrelevant.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0010
rows.name:
However, I cannot allow what
he and I have done to be
forgotten by the world.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0011
rows.name:
Even by leaving you this single clue,
you will surely act, and thus our history
will be etched into your hearts.

rows.label: qst103408_msg0013
rows.name:
This name... Please
remember it. Kukuku...
